description:
Software for recording video using Elgato capture cards


What‚Äôs new in 4K Capture Utility 1.17.13?

üÜï Capture Ultrawide video with 4K X
4K X now supports capturing popular ultrawide display formats 3440x1440 and 2560x1080.
- Additional ultrawide formats may work, though they have not been validated by Elgato.
To get started capturing ultrawide with 4K X, take a look at this guide.

üõ†Ô∏è Bug fixes & performance improvements
- Improved 4K X initialization time when launching 4K Capture Utility
- Resolved an issue where ‚ÄúDevice is in use‚Äù would appear when launching 4K Capture Utility for 4K X even though the device is not in use
- The 4K Pro driver has been updated to 1.1.202.7, which fixes color issues when switching from RGB to NV12 or YUY2 in apps like OBS Studio

Want to share feedback on 4K Capture Utility 1.7.13? Connect with us:
- Leave a comment on our Subreddit
- Chat with fellow community members on Discord
- Hit up @elgato on Twitter
- Contact our Support Team
